verses.verse: And he made <WH6213> the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>: five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753> thereof, and five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> thereof; it was foursquare <WH7251>; and three <WH7969> cubits <WH520> the height <WH6967> thereof.
And he made <WH6213> the horns <WH7161> thereof on the four <WH702> corners <WH6438> of it; the horns <WH7161> thereof were of the same: and he overlaid <WH6823> it with brass <WH5178>.

And he made <WH6213> all the vessels <WH3627> of the altar <WH4196>, the pots <WH5518>, and the shovels <WH3257>, and the basons <WH4219>, and the fleshhooks <WH4207>, and the firepans <WH4289>: all the vessels <WH3627> thereof made <WH6213> he of brass <WH5178>.
And he made <WH6213> for the altar <WH4196> a brasen <WH5178> grate <WH4345> of network <WH7568> <WH4639> under the compass <WH3749> thereof beneath <WH4295> unto the midst <WH2677> of it.
And he cast <WH3332> four <WH702> rings <WH2885> for the four <WH702> ends <WH7099> of the grate <WH4345> of brass <WH5178>, to be places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905>.
And he made <WH6213> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and overlaid <WH6823> them with brass <WH5178>.
And he put <WH935> the staves <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> on the sides <WH6763> of the altar <WH4196>, to bear <WH5375> it withal; he made <WH6213> the altar hollow <WH5014> with boards <WH3871>.

And he made <WH6213> the laver <WH3595> of brass <WH5178>, and the foot <WH3653> of it of brass <WH5178>, of the lookingglasses <WH4759> of the women assembling <WH6633>, which assembled <WH6633> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>. lookingglasses: or, brasen glasses assembling: Heb. assembling by troops

And he made <WH6213> the court <WH2691>: on the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward <WH8486> the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691> were of fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>, an hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>:
Their pillars <WH5982> were twenty <WH6242>, and their brasen <WH5178> sockets <WH134> twenty <WH6242>; the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> were of silver <WH3701>.

And for the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> the hangings were an hundred <WH3967> cubits <WH520>, their pillars <WH5982> were twenty <WH6242>, and their sockets <WH134> of brass <WH5178> twenty <WH6242>; the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> of silver <WH3701>.

And for the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> were hangings <WH7050> of fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>, their pillars <WH5982> ten <WH6235>, and their sockets <WH134> ten <WH6235>; the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> of silver <WH3701>.
And for the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> eastward <WH4217> fifty <WH2572> cubits <WH520>.
The hangings <WH7050> of the one side <WH3802> of the gate were fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> cubits <WH520>; their pillars <WH5982> three <WH7969>, and their sockets <WH134> three <WH7969>.

And for the other <WH8145> side <WH3802> of the court <WH2691> gate <WH8179>, on this hand and that hand, were hangings <WH7050> of fifteen <WH2568> <WH6240> cubits <WH520>; their pillars <WH5982> three <WH7969>, and their sockets <WH134> three <WH7969>.
All the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439> were of fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>.

And the sockets <WH134> for the pillars <WH5982> were of brass <WH5178>; the hooks <WH2053> of the pillars <WH5982> and their fillets <WH2838> of silver <WH3701>; and the overlaying <WH6826> of their chapiters <WH7218> of silver <WH3701>; and all the pillars <WH5982> of the court <WH2691> were filleted <WH2836> with silver <WH3701>.

And the hanging <WH4539> for the gate <WH8179> of the court <WH2691> was needlework <WH7551> <WH4639>, of blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine twined <WH7806> linen <WH8336>: and twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753>, and the height <WH6967> in the breadth <WH7341> was five <WH2568> cubits <WH520>, answerable <WH5980> to the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>.

And their pillars <WH5982> were four <WH702>, and their sockets <WH134> of brass <WH5178> four <WH702>; their hooks <WH2053> of silver <WH3701>, and the overlaying <WH6826> of their chapiters <WH7218> and their fillets <WH2838> of silver <WH3701>.
And all the pins <WH3489> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>, were of brass <WH5178>.

This <WH428> is the sum <WH6485> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, even of the tabernacle <WH4908> of testimony <WH5715>, as it was counted <WH6485>, according to the commandment <WH6310> of Moses <WH4872>, for the service <WH5656> of the Levites <WH3881>, by the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385>, son <WH1121> to Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>.

And Bezaleel <WH1212> the son <WH1121> of Uri <WH221>, the son <WH1121> of Hur <WH2354>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah <WH3063>, made <WH6213> all that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.

And with him was Aholiab <WH171>, son <WH1121> of Ahisamach <WH294>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, an engraver <WH2796>, and a cunning workman <WH2803>, and an embroiderer <WH7551> in blue <WH8504>, and in purple <WH713>, and in scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine linen <WH8336>.

All the gold <WH2091> that was occupied <WH6213> for the work <WH4399> in all the work <WH4399> of the holy <WH6944> place, even the gold <WH2091> of the offering <WH8573>, was twenty <WH6242> and nine <WH8672> talents <WH3603>, and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> shekels <WH8255>, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>.

And the silver <WH3701> of them that were numbered <WH6485> of the congregation <WH5712> was an hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603>, and a thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and threescore and fifteen <WH7657> <WH2568> shekels <WH8255>, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>:

A bekah <WH1235> for every man <WH1538>, that is, half <WH4276> a shekel <WH8255>, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, for every one that went <WH5674> to be numbered <WH6485>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, for six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> men. every man: Heb. a poll

And of the hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603> of silver <WH3701> were cast <WH3332> the sockets <WH134> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, and the sockets <WH134> of the vail <WH6532>; an hundred <WH3967> sockets <WH134> of the hundred <WH3967> talents <WH3603>, a talent <WH3603> for a socket <WH134>.

And of the thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> seventy <WH7657> and five <WH2568> shekels he made <WH6213> hooks <WH2053> for the pillars <WH5982>, and overlaid <WH6823> their chapiters <WH7218>, and filleted <WH2836> them.
And the brass <WH5178> of the offering <WH8573> was seventy <WH7657> talents <WH3603>, and two thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> shekels <WH8255>.

And therewith he made <WH6213> the sockets <WH134> to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and the brasen <WH5178> altar <WH4196>, and the brasen <WH5178> grate <WH4345> for it, and all the vessels <WH3627> of the altar <WH4196>,

And the sockets <WH134> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>, and the sockets <WH134> of the court <WH2691> gate <WH8179>, and all the pins <WH3489> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and all the pins <WH3489> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>.
